body_html:
@JcmeLs That error message indicates that label is a rank-1 tensor (vector) of unknown length. You'll need to either set its shape or reshape it as well. I'm guessing that the following will work, but it's not entirely clear without more context:

label = tf.reshape(label, [])  # Reshape to a scalar.
body_text:
@JcmeLs That error message indicates that label is a rank-1 tensor (vector) of unknown length. You'll need to either set its shape or reshape it as well. I'm guessing that the following will work, but it's not entirely clear without more context:
label = tf.reshape(label, [])  # Reshape to a scalar.
body:
@JcmeLs That error message indicates that `label` is a rank-1 tensor (vector) of unknown length. You'll need to either set its shape or reshape it as well. I'm guessing that the following will work, but it's not entirely clear without more context:

```
label = tf.reshape(label, [])  # Reshape to a scalar.
```
